_sText:
First things First 
[Important Note] This Map Suggested To PLAY Only Online! because if you die the map will be restart round if die alone 
[Note Number 2] This map Uses custom plugin cvars sm_ar_enable 1 (AutoRespawn) and mp_ignore_round_win_conditions 1 (NoRound End even all players are dead)
i dont know if mp_ignore_round_win_conditions works on css steam cuz i use old versions of the game
but anyway i will put both plugins in the rar file in the download
sorry for this types of map posting but i did a lot of work on it
CREDITS
Emnu - Red Flash / Ideas
Nyctophobia - Boss HP Materials
Pycc-Team - Moving Monster Attacker Tools Coding 

Musics
First Music of the Fight - Kevin Macloud
Second Music of the Fight - Kevin Macloud
End Music - Gaming Songs

Anyway i hope you enjoy the map
You Find a Problem in the Map? Comment
